extraction.title: Crash with database corruption
extraction.description: Issue by jpmens from Friday Jan 10, 2014 at 18:36 GMT Originally opened as binarybucks/mqttitude#259version 5.4 running on iOS 7 on an iPhone 4After restart of app, settings are gone:Exiting the app displays a new popup I hadn't seen before: :-)
extraction.comments: Comment by jpmens from Saturday Jan 11, 2014 at 14:59 GMTThis device now updated to 5.5
